name: ice-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The foe is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The foe is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
